name: slack-ai-assistant
description: Cloud Runで動作するSlack AIアシスタントボット

scripts.deploy: sh -c 'source .env && gcloud builds submit --tag gcr.io/$(gcloud config get-value project)/slack-ai-assistant && gcloud run deploy slack-ai-assistant --image gcr.io/$(gcloud config get-value project)/slack-ai-assistant --platform managed --allow-unauthenticated --region asia-northeast1 --update-env-vars SLACK_BOT_TOKEN=$SLACK_BOT_TOKEN,SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET=$SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET'
